recipe.title: Paneer Butter Masala
recipe.ingredients: paneer, butter, onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste, cashew nuts, fresh cream, garam masala, red chilli powder, turmeric, salt, sugar, kasuri methi, oil
recipe.steps:
1. Heat butter and oil in a pan, sauté chopped onions until golden.
2. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until fragrant.
3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
4. Grind cooked onions and tomatoes with soaked cashews into a smooth paste.
5. Return paste to the pan, add turmeric, red chilli powder, garam masala, salt, and sugar.
6. Pour in water to adjust consistency, simmer for 5 minutes.
7. Add paneer cubes and fresh cream, cook for 3–4 minutes.
8. Crush kasuri methi between palms and sprinkle on top before serving.
recipe.tags: indian, vegetarian, curry, north indian, main course

recipe.title: Masoor Dal Tadka
recipe.ingredients: masoor dal, onion, tomato, green chilli, garlic, ginger, turmeric, red chilli powder, cumin seeds, mustard seeds, coriander powder, salt, ghee, coriander leaves
recipe.steps:
1. Rinse masoor dal and pressure cook with turmeric, salt, and water until soft.
2. In a separate pan, heat ghee, add cumin seeds and mustard seeds, let them splutter.
3. Add chopped onions, sauté until golden.
4. Add garlic, ginger, and green chilli, cook for a minute.
5. Stir in chopped tomatoes, cook until soft.
6. Add red chilli powder and coriander powder, mix well.
7. Pour the cooked dal into the pan, add water if needed to adjust consistency.
8. Simmer for 5 minutes, garnish with coriander leaves, and serve hot with rice or roti.
recipe.tags: indian, vegetarian, dal, comfort food, protein-rich
